Shoreline / North Central / Queen Anne Softball Juniors

Congratulations to the Juniors team for winning the Washington State tournament!

Team photos coming soon

They now advance to the West Region tournament in Tucson, AZ

Our team will compete to advance to the Junior Softball Little League World Series. This team, the "Queens", consists of players from Shoreline, Queen Anne, and North Central Little League and came out of the loser-bracket to win both Championship and "if necessary" games to win the state title.

Support Our Team

Shoreline LL, North Central LL, and Queen Anne LL are 100% volunteer run non-profit organizations that rely on generous donations from the community to support budgets for travel to state, regional, and national tournament venues. Every donation, big or small, goes directly toward travel, lodging, and meal costs for our players and their families.

Please consider supporting these players competing on the national stage.
